languages.text: "Прекратите осквернять останки священной земли Первых подобием речи, мон-кай". {n}Пестрые одежды Арлекина тускло переливаются под неверным солнцем местной звезды, а зловещая ухмылка на маске лишь придает образу угрозу и отчужденность.{/n} "Совсем скоро наступит финальный акт, в котором вам суждено расплатиться за грехи предков. И пока кукловод не потянет за ниточки — оставайтесь недвижимы".

traits.locale_text: "Прекратите осквернять останки священной земли Первых подобием речи, мон-кай". {n}Пестрые одежды Арлекина тускло переливаются под неверным солнцем местной звезды, а зловещая ухмылка на маске лишь придает образу угозу и отчужденность.{/n} "Совсем скоро наступит финальный акт, в котором вам суждено расплатиться за грехи предков. И пока кукловод не потянет за ниточки — оставайтесь недвижимы".
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "You will stop defiling the remains of the hallowed ground of our ancestors with your semblance of speech, mon-keigh." {n}The Harlequin's bright clothes glimmer faintly in the dim light of the system's star, and the sinister grin on his mask only adds to his menacing and aloof presence.{/n} "The final act will soon unfold where you will pay for the deeds of your ancestors. Stay put and wait for the puppeteer to pull at your strings."
languages.original_text: "Прекратите осквернять останки священной земли Первых подобием речи, мон-кай". {n}Пестрые одежды Арлекина тускло переливаются под неверным солнцем местной звезды, а зловещая ухмылка на маске лишь придает образу угрозу и отчужденность.{/n} "Совсем скоро наступит финальный акт, в котором вам суждено расплатиться за грехи предков. И пока кукловод не потянет за ниточки — оставайтесь недвижимы".

Be still and wait for the puppeteer to pull at your strings."

Be still and wait for the puppeteer to pull at your strings."

traits.locale_text: "You will stop defiling the remains of the hallowed ground of our ancestors with your semblance of speech, mon-keigh." {n}The Harlequin's bright clothes glimmer faintly in the dim light of the system's star, and the sinister grin on his mask only adds to his menacing and aloof presence.{/n} "The final act will soon unfold where you will pay for the sinful deeds of your ancestors. Stay put and wait for the puppeteer to pull at your strings."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

traits.locale_text: "You will stop defiling the remains of the hallowed ground of our ancestors with your semblance of speech, mon-keigh." {n}The Harlequin's bright clothes glimmer faintly in the dim light of the system's star, and the sinister grin on his mask only adds to his menacing and aloof presence.{/n} "The final act will soon unfold where you will pay for the sinful deeds of your ancestors. Stay put and wait for the puppeteer to pull at your strings."

Stay put and wait for the puppeteer to pull at your strings."

traits.locale_text: "You will stop defiling the remains of the hallowed ground of our ancestors with your semblance of speech, mon-keigh." {n}The Harlequin's bright clothes glimmer faintly in the dim light of the system's star, and the sinister grin on his mask only adds to his menacing and aloof presence.{/n} "The final act will soon unfold where you will pay for the deeds of your ancestors. Stay put and wait for the puppeteer to pull at your strings."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: 「うわべだけの言葉で、我らが父祖の神聖な大地の足跡を汚すのはを止めようか、モン＝ケイ」{n}ハーレクィンの輝く衣服が、星系に浮かぶ星の薄明かりでチラチラと光る。その仮面に浮かぶ邪悪な笑みが恐ろしくも冷淡な空気をただ添えている。{/n}「最後の幕はまもなく上がるよ、君の祖先に対する行いに対する報いを受ける場所で。人形師が君の糸を引くまで、その場で待ちな」
languages.original_text: "You will stop defiling the remains of the hallowed ground of our ancestors with your semblance of speech, mon-keigh." {n}The Harlequin's bright clothes glimmer faintly in the dim light of the system's star, and the sinister grin on his mask only adds to his menacing and aloof presence.{/n} "The final act will soon unfold where you will pay for the deeds of your ancestors. Stay put and wait for the puppeteer to pull at your strings."

traits.locale_text: 「うわべだけの言葉で、我らが父祖の神聖な大地の足跡を汚すのはを止めようか、モン＝ケイ」{n}ハーレクィンの輝く衣服が、星系に浮かぶ星の薄明かりでチラチラと光る。その仮面に浮かぶ邪悪な笑みが恐ろしくも冷淡な空気をただ添えている。{/n}「最後の幕はまもなく上がるよ、君の祖先に対する罪深い行いに対する報いを受ける場所で。人形師が君の糸を引くまで、その場で待ちな」
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: “不要再用你的言语来玷污我们祖先的圣地了，猴子。”{n}恒星昏暗的光芒之下，这位丑角明亮的衣服闪烁着微弱的光芒。他面具上阴险的笑容让他看起来更加冷漠、更加危险。{/n}“最后一幕好戏即将上演，你们将为祖先的罪恶行径付出代价。不要乱动，等待木偶大师来拉动你们的丝线吧。”
languages.original_text: "You will stop defiling the remains of the hallowed ground of our ancestors with your semblance of speech, mon-keigh." {n}The Harlequin's bright clothes glimmer faintly in the dim light of the system's star, and the sinister grin on his mask only adds to his menacing and aloof presence.{/n} "The final act will soon unfold where you will pay for the deeds of your ancestors. Stay put and wait for the puppeteer to pull at your strings."

traits.locale_text: “不要再用你的言语来玷污我们祖先的圣地了，猴子。”{n}恒星昏暗的光芒之下，这位丑角明亮的衣服闪烁着微弱的光芒。他面具上阴险的笑容让他看起来更加冷漠、更加危险。{/n}“最后一幕好戏即将上演，你们将为祖先的罪恶行径付出代价。不要乱动，等待木偶大师来拉动你们的丝线吧。”
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: « Vous allez cesser de souiller les vestiges des terres sacrées de nos ancêtres avec vos inepties, mon-keigh. » {n}Les vêtements bariolés de l'Arlequin miroitent faiblement dans la douce clarté de l'étoile, tandis que le sourire sinistre figé sur son masque ne fait que le rendre d'autant plus menaçant.{/n} « Le dernier acte est sur le point de commencer, et l'heure est bientôt venue pour vous de payer pour les crimes de vos ancêtres. Alors, soyez sage et laissez le marionnettiste mener la danse. »
languages.original_text: "You will stop defiling the remains of the hallowed ground of our ancestors with your semblance of speech, mon-keigh." {n}The Harlequin's bright clothes glimmer faintly in the dim light of the system's star, and the sinister grin on his mask only adds to his menacing and aloof presence.{/n} "The final act will soon unfold where you will pay for the deeds of your ancestors. Stay put and wait for the puppeteer to pull at your strings."

traits.locale_text: « Vous allez cesser de souiller les vestiges des terres sacrées de nos ancêtres avec vos inepties, mon-keigh. » {n}Les vêtements bariolés de l'arlequin miroitent faiblement dans la douce clarté de l'étoile, tandis que le sourire sinistre figé sur son masque ne fait que le rendre d'autant plus menaçant.{/n} « Le dernier acte est sur le point de commencer, et l'heure est bientôt venue pour vous de payer pour les péchés de vos ancêtres. Alors, soyez sage et laissez le marionnettiste mener la danse. »
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: «Vas a dejar de profanar los restos de la tierra sagrada de nuestros ancestros con tus intentos de comunicación, mon-keigh». {n}Las ropas coloridas del Arlequín relucen ligeramente bajo la luz tenue de la estrella del sistema, y la sonrisa siniestra de la máscara hace su actitud distante aún más amenazante.{/n} «Pronto se abrirá el telón del último acto, en el que pagaréis por los actos de vuestros ancestros. No te muevas; espera a que el titiritero tire de tus hilos».
languages.original_text: "You will stop defiling the remains of the hallowed ground of our ancestors with your semblance of speech, mon-keigh." {n}The Harlequin's bright clothes glimmer faintly in the dim light of the system's star, and the sinister grin on his mask only adds to his menacing and aloof presence.{/n} "The final act will soon unfold where you will pay for the deeds of your ancestors. Stay put and wait for the puppeteer to pull at your strings."

traits.locale_text: «Vas a dejar de profanar los restos de la tierra sagrada de nuestros ancestros con tus intentos de comunicación, mon-keigh». {n}Las ropas coloridas del Arlequín relucen ligeramente bajo la luz tenue de la estrella del sistema, y la sonrisa siniestra de la máscara hace su actitud distante aún más amenazante.{/n} «Pronto se abrirá el telón del último acto, en el que pagaréis por los pecados de vuestros ancestros. No te muevas; espera a que el titiritero tire de tus hilos».
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Ihr hört augenblicklich auf, die Überreste der heiligen Stätte unserer Ahnen mit Euren sprachähnlichen Äußerungen zu schänden, Chem-Pan-Sey." {n}Die bunte Kleidung des Harlekins glimmert schwach im trüben Licht des örtlichen Sterns. Das finstere Grinsen auf seiner Maske trägt nur noch zu seiner bedrohlichen und überheblichen Ausstrahlung bei.{/n} "Der letzte Akt wird sich bald abspielen, in dem Ihr für die Taten Eurer Ahnen bezahlen werdet. Bleibt und wartet, bis der Puppenspieler an Euren Strippen zieht."
languages.original_text: "You will stop defiling the remains of the hallowed ground of our ancestors with your semblance of speech, mon-keigh." {n}The Harlequin's bright clothes glimmer faintly in the dim light of the system's star, and the sinister grin on his mask only adds to his menacing and aloof presence.{/n} "The final act will soon unfold where you will pay for the deeds of your ancestors. Stay put and wait for the puppeteer to pull at your strings."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr hört augenblicklich auf, die Überreste der heiligen Stätte unserer Ahnen mit Euren sprachähnlichen Äußeren zu schänden, Chem-Pan-Sey." {n}Die bunte Kleidung des Harlekins glimmert schwach im trüben Licht des örtlichen Sterns. Das finstere Grinsen auf seiner Maske trägt nur noch zu seiner bedrohlichen und überheblichen Ausstrahlung bei.{/n} "Der letzte Akt wird sich bald abspielen, in dem Ihr für die sündigen Taten Eurer Ahnen bezahlen werdet. Bleibt und wartet, bis der Puppenspieler an Euren Strippen zieht."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Ağzından çıkan çirkin laflarla atalarımızın kutsal topraklarına leke sürmeyi bırakacaksın mon-keigh." {n}Arleken'in parlak kıyafetleri, sistemin yıldızının loş ışığında hafifçe parıldarken maskesindeki uğursuz sırıtış ise tehditkâr ve lakayıt duruşuna tüy dikiyor.{/n} "Birazdan son sahneye geldiğimizde atalarının suçlarının bedelini ödeyeceksin. Oracıkta bekle. Kuklacı, birazdan iplerinle oynamaya başlar."
languages.original_text: "You will stop defiling the remains of the hallowed ground of our ancestors with your semblance of speech, mon-keigh." {n}The Harlequin's bright clothes glimmer faintly in the dim light of the system's star, and the sinister grin on his mask only adds to his menacing and aloof presence.{/n} "The final act will soon unfold where you will pay for the deeds of your ancestors. Stay put and wait for the puppeteer to pull at your strings."

traits.locale_text: "Ağzından çıkan çirkin laflarla atalarımızın kutsal topraklarına leke sürmeyi bırakacaksın mon-keigh." {n}Arleken'in parlak kıyafetleri, sistemin yıldızının loş ışığında hafifçe parıldarken; maskesindeki uğursuz sırıtış ise tehditkâr ve lakayıt duruşuna tüy dikiyor.{/n} "Yakında son sahneye geldiğimizde atalarının suçlarının bedelini ödeyeceksin. Oracıkta kal, kuklacı iplerinle oynar birazdan."
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader
